SEARCH
Package librarySE.core

Interface Searchable

All Known Subinterfaces:
LibraryItem
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLibraryItem, Book, CD, Journal
public interface Searchable
Represents the ability of a library item to be searched by keyword.

Classes implementing this interface (e.g., Book, Journal, CD) define how keyword matching is performed, typically by comparing the keyword against one or more fields such as title, author, or editor.

Author:
malak

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    matchesKeyword(String keyword)
    Determines whether this item matches the specified search keyword.

  • Method Details

    • matchesKeyword

      boolean matchesKeyword(String keyword)
      Determines whether this item matches the specified search keyword.

      Implementations may perform case-insensitive comparisons and may check multiple fields for matches (e.g., title, author, ISBN).

      Parameters:
      keyword - the search keyword; must not be null or empty
      Returns:
      true if this item matches the keyword, false otherwise
